sections.summary: creative communications professional with over a decade of experience in planning and implementing strategic, results driven communication programs that integrate traditional public relations with emerging social and digital media communications strategies. extensive experience in semiconductor, wireless networking, telecommunications, cloud computing and pcb design market segments.
sections.skills: proficient in microsoft office suite experienced with multiple media databases, including: vocus, cision and mymediainfo. familiar with social media and influencer management tools, such as hootsuite, buffer, socialbro, trendkite and buzzsumo.
